welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Burlingame! Known for its quaint charm and beautiful scenery, this city is the perfect destination for your visit. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Burlingame has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at SFO, serving domestic flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at SFO, serving domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines, JetBlue, and Virgin America.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: Serving all international flights and some domestic flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and bandwidth.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Half Moon Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Palo Alto Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Palo Alto Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Terminal Airport is a modern and spacious building, offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Air Terminal Airport provides a more exclusive and personalized experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Livermore Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Livermore Airport caters to private jet and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
